item.title: Smell of dead animal, 15th October
item.description:
Inside the hallway of 3-8 Selina House there is a foul smell that has worsened the past few days, indicating a dead animal within either the service door below the stairs or in the walls that have open access panels/holes. Most likely on the ground floor. The smell is undeniable and very strong and will need imminent care.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Capland Street, St. John's Wood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 Cars park in residential bays all day, 15th October
item.description:
These two ford vehicles park in these residential bays during the work week all day. The drivers have been seen leaving the area towards the train station after parking. Can they please be given tickets for parking longer than allowed in these bays. They are for residents and short stays, not for commuters.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Pinks Hill, High Firs, Swanley
Report on FixMyStreet
